Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Knox
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63es, Pulaski, 59th, and Midway, due to street blockage near 63rd/Knox.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Pulaski, 59th, and Midway, due to street blockage near 63rd/Knox.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Forest Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier signal problems at Forest Park. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
